## Plugin.start() method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

        indexPatterns: {
            indexPatternsServiceFactory: (kibanaRequest: import("../../../core/server").KibanaRequest<unknown, unknown, unknown, any>) => Promise<import("../public").IndexPatternsService>;
        };
    };
```
